title: Creative Human Programming Is King, Bain Report Says
description: An AI report by Bain says there is a flood of cheap artificial intelligence content but premium, human created content remains king.
content: Will artificial intelligence upend or help the media and entertainment industry? That is one of the hot topics of debate of our time. In particular, will cheap AI-generated content outperform human creativity? Management consulting firm Bain & Co., i... [4052 chars]

title: Will Smith accused of using AI to create crowd footage in video
description: Will Smith's video featuring song "You Can Make It" sparks controversy as viewers notice alleged artificial intelligence-generated crowd scenes with distorted fan images.

title: AI and precision farming could stabilize food prices but small farmers risk exclusion
description: The study finds that digital agriculture has significant potential to reduce food inflation by boosting productivity and making supply chains more resilient. Technologies such as artificial intelligence, robotics, blockchain, nanotechnology, and big data can transform farming practices. Smart sensors allow farmers to optimize fertilizer and water use, while predictive analytics improve planting and harvesting schedules. Blockchain systems offer transparent traceability, reducing logistics costs and waste.
content: Global food prices have become one of the most pressing economic concerns of the decade, driven by climate shocks, wars, and fragile supply chains. Around the world, governments are turning to digital farming technologies as a potential solution to s... [5109 chars]

title: Vision 2030 and Saudi Arabia’s road to AI supremacy
description: With the power to transform economies, redefine national security and reshape how societies function, artificial intelligence is the defining technology of the 21st century. title: Nvidia shares fall as investors weigh AI bubble risk after Altman warning
description: Shares in chipmaking giant Nvidia fell despite the group predicting continued bumper demand as investors feared the emergence of an artificial intelligence bubble.
content:

title: Volkswagen extends Amazon cloud partnership to save costs with AI
description: Volkswagen has extended its 'factory cloud' partnership with Amazon Web Services by another five years, the German carmaker said on Thursday, as it rolls out the use of artificial intelligence to improve production and reduce costs.
